markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 15"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cloud Jump](/Feats.aspx?ID=767) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 260 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Legendary in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

You unparalleled athletic skill allows you to jump impossible distances. Triple the distance you [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=37) (so you could jump 60 feet on a successful DC 20 check). When you [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=36), use the calculation for a Long Jump but don't triple the distance.

 You can jump a distance greater than your Speed by spending additional actions when you Long Jump or High Jump. For each additional action spent, add your Speed to the limit on how far you can [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=81).
name: Cloud Jump

<summary>
Jump impossible distances.

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 15" pfs="Standard" > Cloud Jump Source Core Rulebook pg. 260 4.0 Prerequisites Legendary in Athletics --- You unparalleled athletic skill allows you to jump impossible distances. Triple the distance you Long Jump (so you could jump 60 feet on a successful DC 20 check). When you High Jump, use the calculation for a Long Jump but don't triple the distance. You can jump a distance greater than your Speed by spending additional actions when you Long Jump or High Jump. For each additional action spent, add your Speed to the limit on how far you can Leap.
